alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lawrence; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 11 at 3:09AM CDT until April 11 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Dade, Dallas, Greene, Jasper, Lawrence and Polk. * WHEN...Until 915 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 309 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Clear Creek at Farm Road 87, Sinking Creek at County Road 181, Sac River at County Road 1247, Asher Creek at 560 Road and Fidelity Branch at County Road 130. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northwestern Springfield, Greenfield, Willard, Ash Grove, Lockwood, Miller, Walnut Grove and Pleasant Hope. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
